title: Michael Smith on Sean Payton, Saints-Falcons, Playoff QB play
description:
Bomani Jones and Michael Smith of Peacock’s “Brother From Another” discuss Saints coach Sean Payton deciding to step down from the team, and why Bo still “hates” the Saints even though he’s “off that narcotic” (1:32). Plus, they get into the level of QB play you need to have success in the league through the lens of the playoffs thus far (22:26).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
